def_en: In cricket, a wicket is a set of three upright sticks with two small sticks on top of them at which the ball is bowled. There are two wickets on a cricket pitch.

def_cn: (板球场中)两个三柱门之间的场地
def_en: In cricket, a wicket is the area of grass in between the two wickets on the pitch.

def_cn: （板球运动中）击球手击球的一轮，击球手的避免出局
def_en: In cricket, when a wicket falls or is taken, a batsman is out.
